response.original_title: Basketball State – The Land of 10,000 Hoops
response.overview: In the upper midwest of America lies a forgotten state that has been a fruitful factory of hoopers for decades. Traditionally known as a Hockey state, it is becoming clear that Minnesota is just as much a BASKETBALL STATE. This documentary dives into the history and rise of basketball in Minnesota told through the perspective of various players and coaches who all have a unique love story with the game.
response.title: Basketball State – The Land of 10,000 Hoops
